deprecationInfo.message: The invalid registration warning became an alert with both a title and subtitle instead of just a one-line warning. The replacement keys are %paratextRegistration_alert_invalidRegistration% and %paratextRegistration_alert_invalidRegistration_description%.
The registration in Paratext 10 Studio is no longer shared with Paratext 9

en.%internetSettings_webView_tooltip%: Enter your Paratext Registration Internet Settings into this form.
en.%paratextRegistration_alert_invalidRegis: Registration Name and Code do not match
Check to make sure what you entered is an exact match.
en.%paratextRegistration_alert_unchangedReg: Registration code and name have not been modified!
en.%paratextRegistration_alert_updatedInter: Your changes to the internet settings were successfully applied!
en.%paratextRegistration_alert_updatedRegis: Changes applied! The application will restart in a few seconds.
The application successfully restarted! Your changes are now in effect.
en.%paratextRegistration_alert_validRegistr: Registration Code and Name are valid
You can now save the changes and the app will restart to make them in effect.
en.%paratextRegistration_app_startup_descri: Welcome to {%product_name%}! To get started, login with your registration information.
en.%paratextRegistration_description_intern: These Internet settings only affect connection to Paratext services like the Registry, send/receive, and download resources.
Disable Internet use in sensitive locations
en.%paratextRegistration_description_shared: These settings also apply to Paratext 9.
en.%paratextRegistration_exception_register: You must provide a valid Paratext registration before opening resources from the Digital Bible Library.
en.%paratextRegistration_registration_detai: You can have this information emailed from [__Paratext Registry__]({registryLink}), or get help from your organization's tech support.
en.%paratextRegistration_section_internetSe: These Internet settings only apply to some operations, not to the whole application
en.%paratextRegistration_warning_invalid_em: Please enter a valid email address.
en.%paratextRegistration_warning_invalid_re: This registration code is not correct for this user.
No special symbols except for hyphen `-`.
Registration code must be in the format of 'XXXXXX-XXXXXX-XXXXXX-XXXXXX-XXXXXX'
en.%paratextRegistration_webView_tooltip%: Enter your Paratext Registration Information into this form.
en.%paratextRegistrationProfile_webView_too: Adjust your Paratext Registration Account Information here.
en.%settings_paratextRegistration_registrat: Settings related to the user's Paratext Registry connection and some Internet access controls
en.%settings_paratextRegistration_shouldSho: Whether to show the form to enter Paratext Registration information when the application starts if it has not been entered previously

es.%internetSettings_webView_tooltip%: Introduzca su configuración de registro de Internet de Paratext en este formulario.
es.%paratextRegistration_alert_updatedRegis: Cambios aplicados. La aplicación se reiniciará en unos segundos.
es.%paratextRegistration_commit_comment_cha: Antes de cambiar el usuario registrado
es.%paratextRegistration_description_intern: Estas configuraciones de Internet solo afectan la conexión a los servicios de Paratext, como el Registro, Enviar/Recibir y la descarga de recursos.
Permitir uso de Internet sin restricción
es.%paratextRegistration_description_shared: Estas configuraciones se aplican también a Paratext 9.
es.%paratextRegistration_exception_register: Debe proporcionar credenciales de Registro de Paratext válidas antes de abrir recursos de la Biblioteca Bíblica Digital.
es.%paratextRegistration_section_internetSe: Estas configuraciones de Internet solo se aplican a algunas operaciones, no a toda la aplicación
es.%paratextRegistration_warning_invalid_em: Por favor, ingrese una dirección de correo electrónico válida.
es.%paratextRegistration_warning_invalid_re: Este código de registro es incorrecto para este usuario.
es.%paratextRegistration_webView_tooltip%: Ingrese su información de Registro de Paratext en este formulario.
es.%settings_paratextRegistration_registrat: Configuraciones relacionadas con la conexión del Registro de Paratext del usuario y algunos controles de acceso a Internet
Registro de Paratext y Configuración de Internet
es.%settings_paratextRegistration_shouldSho: Mostrar el formulario de Registro de Paratext al iniciar si aún no ha ingresado sus credenciales
Mostrar “Información de Registro de Paratext” al iniciar
